references.paper_title: Semantic-enhanced differentiable search index inspired by learning strategies
references.reason: This paper introduces a novel approach to enhancing the search index by incorporating semantic information, directly contributing to the core methodology of the main paper.

references.paper_title: Continual learning for generative retrieval over dynamic corpora
references.reason: This work addresses the challenge of adapting generative retrieval models to dynamic corpora, a crucial aspect for practical applications also discussed in the main paper.

references.paper_title: Autoregressive search engines: Generating substrings as document identifiers
references.reason: This paper introduces the concept of autoregressive search engines which directly informs the generative retrieval approach of the main paper.

references.paper_title: Transformer memory as a differentiable search index
references.reason: This paper proposes a method to use Transformer memory as a search index, offering an alternative to traditional indexing methods and also discussed in the main paper.

references.paper_title: Rethinking search: Making domain experts out of dilettantes
references.reason: This paper introduces the concept of generative retrieval, which is the main focus of the current paper.
